Name: Skyward Harp
Title: Echoing Ballad: Skyward Harp
Desc: The sound of this sky-piercing lyre firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears.

Talent.Name: Skyward Harp
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> This character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 additional DMG.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3202}Bow Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
